snippet.title: Official Announcement Trailer - Oculus Platform Edition
snippet.description:
We’ve been keeping this one close to the chest for some time, and now that the cat is officially out of the bag we can finally talk about it… The [secret project] we’ve been hinting at on our various social channels is a brand new version of Myst, completely reimagined for modern game systems and - for the first time for any game in the Myst series - including optional VR support!

We hope it gave you chills… It gives US chills and we made it! 

Myst will be available to play in VR for Quest Platform (through the Oculus Store) and on PC (Windows) through Steam, the Oculus Store, and GOG. Any future platform or store availability will be announced at a later date.

We’ve got a quick favor to ask… If you’re excited about this game, could you help us out by wishlisting it on Steam or GOG? Not only will it help you to stay notified when the game launches, but it really helps us to gauge interest and excitement levels about Myst:

Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255560/Myst/
GOG Wishlist: https://www.gog.com/game/myst
Oculus Product Detail Page: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/2719294624823942/
